result.title: Invitation to the February Lunchtime 2015 on CodeChef
result.content:
CodeChef invites you to participate in the February Lunchtime at http://www.codechef.com/LTIME21/. This is an IOI style contest. This means that the problems will be partially graded. You will get score for passing certain test data.

Contest Details: 22nd February 2015, 11:00 hrs to 14:00 hrs. (Indian Standard Time — +5:30 GMT) — Check your timezone.

Contest Link: http://www.codechef.com/LTIME21/

Registration: Just need to have a CodeChef user id to participate.

New users please register here

  • Problem Setter & Russian Translator : Sergey Kulik
  • Problem Tester : Roman Furko
  • Editorialist: Balajiganapathi Senthilnathan
  • Mandarin Translator: Minako Kojima
  • Contest Admin: Praveen Dhinwa

It promises to deliver on an interesting set of algorithmic problems with something for all. The contest is open for all and those, who are interested, are requested to have a CodeChef userid, in order to participate.
